Enrique es un hombre casado de 34 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y sus cinco hijos  de 16, 19, 10, 5 y de 2 años de edad,  de los cuales cuatro están estudiando y el pequeño aun esta al cuidado de la madre, actualmente residen en el Departamento de Sololá.
El es un hombre que trabaja en el campo como agricultor, cultivando papa y otras hortalizas para el consumo del ser humano. Eligió esta actividad  porque desde pequeño su padre le enseño este oficio, que le ha traído buenos beneficios en cuanto a la economía de su familia. Como también comenta que esta labor le permite trabajar por las tardes como panadero.
El ahora está solicitando un préstamo de Q 3,500.00 para la compra semillas de papa y abono orgánico que servirá para su cultivo y de esta manera podrá mejorar la economía de su familia.
Su mayor sueño es incrementar sus ganancias a través de las dos actividades que realiza, con el propósito de mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Enrique is a 34-year-old married man. He lives with his wife and five children (ages 16, 19, 10, 5, and 2). Four of his children are studying and the youngest is being cared for by his mother. They currently reside in the Department of Sololá.

Enrique works in the countryside as a farmer. He grows potatoes and other vegetables for human consumption. Enrique chose this line of work because he learned the trade from his father. It has been a great benefit to his family's financial situation. Enrique says that being in this trade allows him to also work as a baker in the afternoons.

He is now requesting a loan of 3,500 GTQ in order to buy seed potatoes and organic fertilizer for his crop. This will help to improve his family's finances. His greatest wish is to increase his earnings through his two business activities with the intention of improving his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy seed potatoes and organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia es una joven de 26 años que vive en Quillacollo, provincia ubicada a 16 km. del centro de la ciudad de Cochabamba. Ella es Ingeniera Química y trabaja en la Alcaldía de Quillacollo.  Proviene de una familia de siete hermanos, su papá es minero jubilado y su mamá es ama de casa. Su pasión por su carrera nació desde muy pequeña, desde que una profesora le dijo que el agua es vida y que el agua esta hecha de química. 
Ella es soltera por lo que vive con sus padres, apoyando con los gastos económicos de la casa. Por esta razón solicita un crédito educativo para un Diplomado en Gestión Medio Ambiental, para poder crecer profesionalmente perfeccionando sus conocimientos y tener un mejor ingreso económico.
Julia agradece la oportunidad que se le está brindando para continuar sus estudios superiores.
texts.en:
Julia is 26 years old and lives in the Quillacollo province, 16 km from the centre of the city of Cochabamba.  Julia is a chemical engineer and works for the Quillacollo town hall.  Julia comes from a family a seven children; her father is a retired miner and her mother is a housewife.  Julia has had a passion for her work since she was very young - it all started when one teacher told her that water is life, and that water is made from chemicals.

Julia is single and so lives with her parents, supporting them with household costs.  For this reason, Julia is applying for a loan in order to pay for a diploma in environmental management.  This will allow her to grow as a professional and to develop her knowledge and earn a greater income.  Julia is grateful for this opportunity to continue with her further education.

loans.use: to pay for her diploma in environmental management.

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.en:
Alejandra lives in Totolapan Morelos with her husband, Alejandro, and their two children, Canaldo and Sergio.  Alejandra has been working for the last 10 years selling corn that the family grows.  She has a cart and goes around the neighborhood and neighboring town selling her product.  Alejandro works in the fields and since it is only him and the boys, he rents the land that he is not able to farm on.  Alejandra bought a piece of land 15 years ago before meeting Alejandro.  Once they started living together they started building and expanding the house little by little.  But with the kids and their strenuous work this has been slower than they planned for.  Today, the family lives in a two bedroom house with a living room and what they started building as a kitchen.  

Alejandro and Alejandra make around $700 USD a month through informal jobs, so accessing credit is impossible for them. For the last three months they have been saving to finish building the kitchen with a proper roof that will protect the stove that they bought after saving for quite some time.  Alejandra needs this loan to finish paying for the construction materials.  A proper roof and walls for the kitchen will protect their investment in the stove and will give the family a clean place where they can cook and eat.  The family will receive supervision visits from certified technicians to monitor the quality and progress of the construction.  The new construction will give this family the home they have been dreaming of for so long.  Alejandra is aware that dedication and hard work is what makes dreams come true.

loans.use: to buy materials to finish building her kitchen

loans.name: Isidoro

texts.es:
Isidoro, soltero de 23 años, nacido en la provincia Andres Ibáñez del departamento de Santa Cruz – Bolivia desea cursar una Maestría en Sistemas Integrados de Gestión de Seguridad, Medio Ambiente y Calidad de la Universidad Autónoma Gabriel Rene Moreno, motivo por el cual requiere un Crédito de EDUCA-PRÓ para financiar sus Estudios.

Isidoro trabaja como encargado del Laboratorio de Química  de la misma universidad donde estudio. Vive con sus padres y hermanos, no tiene otros ingresos económicos y ocasionalmente tiene otras actividades como dar ayudantías a alumnos de la misma carrera que necesitan nivelación en sus estudios y realizar algún curso complementario a su carrera. La principal motivación que tiene en la vida, es la superación personal y poder cumplir sus sueños.  

A Isidoro siempre le gustó mucho lo que estudio, es por eso que ahora desea realizar un postgrado, pues está convencido que una de las mayores áreas de influencia para un trabajo en la ciudad donde vive, es justamente el área de la Industria Química, donde cree que por su gran diversidad de roles puede llegar a tener en un futuro, una amplia experiencia laboral.  Sus estudios universitarios los concluyo en 5 años y actualmente ya está titulado. 

Isidoro, aspira a ser docente universitario en la casa de estudios que lo formo y para esto necesita ayuda económica para poder cubrir los gastos que implica el realizar esta Maestría pues es de escasos recursos y sus ingresos son menores y solo alcanzan para ayudar a su familia en los gastos de la casa. El piensa que lo que le diferencia de otros postulantes es el deseo grande que tiene por superarse y cumplir nuevos desafíos, se siente esperanzado y con muchas ganas de poder comenzar un nuevo reto para su vida. 

Isidoro se declara emocionado de saber que hay gente que desea ayudar a otras personas apoyándolos con sus estudios. Si bien cree que la misma sociedad, el tiempo y los problemas familiares son obstáculos que a veces se presentan cuando se quiere salir adelante, también está muy agradecido de enterarse que existen personas de buen corazón que ayudan a jóvenes como él. Isidoro se enteró del programa a través de los comentarios de un amigo que conoció el mismo en una feria educativa.
texts.en:
Isidoro, single and 23 years old, was born in the Andres Ibáñez province in the department of Santa Cruz, Bolivia. He wants to study for a Master's in Integrated Security, Environmental and Quality Systems Management at the Autonomous University of Gabriel Rene Moreno, a goal for which he requires a loan from EDUCA-PRÓ to finance his studies.

Isidoro works as the manager of the chemistry laboratory in the same university where he studies. He lives with his parents and siblings and has no other income. He occasionally has other activities, such as  giving assistance to students in the same career who need grading in their studies, and completing some supplementary courses for his career. The main goal he has in life is self-improvement and being able to finish his studies.

Isidoro has always enjoyed what he studies very much, and this is why he wants to complete a postgraduate degree. He believes that one of the best areas of influence for a job in the city where he lives is industrial chemistry. Because of the large diversity of roles, he believes he can have extensive work experience. His finished his university studies in five years and currently has a degree.

Isidoro aspires to be a university lecturer in the education center where he studied. For this, he needs economic assistance to be able to cover the costs associated with completing a Master's, because he is poor and his income is small and only enough to help his family with household expenses. 

He thinks that he is set apart from other candidates is his large desire to improve himself and meet new challenges. He feels hopeful and eager to begin a new challenge in his life.

Isidoro is excited to know there are people who want to help others and support them in their studies. Although he believes the same society, time and family problems are obstacles that sometimes occur when you want to get ahead, he is also very grateful to know that there are good-hearted people to help young people like him. Isidoro learned of the program through a friend who learned of it at the same educational fair.

loans.use: complete a Master's in Integrated Security, Environmental and Quality Systems Management.

loans.name: Estanislao

texts.es:
Estanislao es casado de 34 años, nacido en la provincia Andres Ibáñez del departamento de Santa Cruz – Bolivia desea culminar sus estudios de Licenciatura de Administración de Empresas en la Universidad Privada Cumbre, motivo por el cual requiere un Crédito de EDUCA-PRÓ para terminar de financiar sus Estudios.  Trabaja hace tiempo en una casa comercial dedicada al rubro del cuero en atención al Cliente. Vive con su esposa e hijo, su padre y hermanos, no tiene otros ingresos económicos, ni actividades extra académicas. Una de sus mayores motivaciones para salir profesional es su hijo por quien trabaja y se esfuerza cada día. 

A Estanislao le gusta mucho lo que estudia puesto que a medida que avanza en su carrera  aprendió también el valor de ser organizado en la vida.  Sus estudios los inicio hace dos años y aunque ha tenido dificultades financieras para concluirlo, espera poder terminarlos muy pronto. 

Estanislao se encuentra trabajando, sin embargo necesita ayuda económica para poder cubrir los gastos que implica el culminar su carrera. El piensa que lo que le diferencia de otros postulantes es la seguridad que tiene en las decisiones que ha tomado en su vida, pues siempre se ha propuesto cumplirlas. Una vez culminada su licenciatura, le gustaría trabajar en alguna empresa del rubro de la Construcción; en el futuro se ve con un trabajo estable, digno y desarrollando su profesión. 

Estanislao se encuentra muy emocionado, feliz y agradecido por el apoyo de las personas que generan mejores oportunidades de vida a sus semejantes que carecen de posibilidades económicas.
texts.en:
Estanislao is a 34 year old married man. He was born in the Andres Ibáñez province in the department of Santa Cruz, Bolivia. He would like to finish his Bachelor’s of Business Administration at the Universidad of Privada Cumbre. His motivation to finance finishing his studies led him to ask for a loan from Educa-Pro. While working at a marketing firm he’s been selling leather in the Customer Relations Team.

He lives with his wife and son, his father, and his brothers. He doesn’t have any other income or other academic pursuits. His son is a great motivation to become a profession, and for him he works hard every day.  

Estanislao likes studying since this is how he’ll advance in his career. He’s also learned the value of being organized. He began his studies two years ago and since these he’s had financial difficulties in finishing them. He hopes to be able to finish very soon.

Estanislao is currently working. Without a doubt he needs financial help to be able to cover the costs associated with concluding his studies. He thinks that what differentiates him from other applicants is how sure he is about the decisions he’s made in his life and how he’s followed through. Once he finishes his degree he would like to work in a construction firm. He’s sees a future for himself with a good stable job and advancing in his career.  

Estanislao is very excited, happy, and thankful for the support of all the people who create better opportunities for those who lack economic opportunities.

loans.use: to finish his Bachelors of Business Administration degree.
